value:
No one in this country knows me. Nor
do they know what I have done. I find
that strangely comforting. Heh-heh.

You know, it's quite impudent of you
to ask about my past. Oh, look at you!
I'm just kidding. Hee-hee!

No matter what world you find
yourself in, chores don't do
themselves. I'll do my share.

I've been told there is a nearby
waterfall. I do love them... Come,
give chase. We shall make a splash!

Are you to serve as my guard? I
assure you—I am trustworthy. I was
just tending to my injuries.

I am Aversa. I bring you a small token
of affection—not mine, of course.

All the naughty children who get in
my way will quake with terror.

Playtime is just about over... Get
ready for something new.

What a scary face! We should be
enjoying ourselves...
Is this what you've been wanting?

Please, call me Aversa. My, you're
adorable. If you don't watch out, I'll
tease you mercilessly.

You come all the way out here rather
often, don't you? I guess you don't
trust me. I'm not a spy, you know.$k$pThat's not it? You think I look sad?
You don't miss much, do you? It's
true. I have many regrets.$k$pI've done terrible things to a lot of
people. There is no way I can atone
for it all...$k$pMy past clings to me. No matter what
I do, I can't make peace with it.$k$pAnd whenever I try to speak with
others, well...it gets in the way.$k$pSpeak plainly, you say? As if that'd
ever work.$k$pIf you're that interested in me, why
don't we spend a little time together?
Until moonrise, perhaps?$k$pAs you may have noticed, I'm the
fiercely loyal type.
はぁっ！
そぉれっ
きゃああっ！
激しいのね…
Still clinging to hope?
All good things must end.
Let's play, shall we?
Always a pleasure.
That...could have felt better...
んふふっ
You may call me Aversa. A pleasure to meet you.
And just what are you looking at, hmm?
My, my, you're bolder than you look, aren't you?
If you wish to observe me, by all means. Just don't skulk in the shadows while you do it.
Perhaps you are more than just another fool in motley, capering on the stage...
You want to know about my past? That's not something that I…
What would you ask of me...if I agreed to follow your every command?
Certainly.
So big and strong.
Care to play?
